net.majorkernelpanic.http
Class TinyHttpServer

java.lang.Object
  Service
      net.majorkernelpanic.http.TinyHttpServer
Direct Known Subclasses:
HttpServer
public class TinyHttpServer
extends Service

A Service that contains a HTTP server and a HTTPS server. Check out the github page of this project for further information. You may add some logic to this server with addRequestHandler(String, HttpRequestHandler). By default it serves files from /assets/www.

Nested Class Summary
static interface TinyHttpServer.CallbackListener
          Be careful: those callbacks won't necessarily be called from the ui thread !
 class TinyHttpServer.LocalBinder
          The Binder you obtain when a connection with the Service is established.
static class TinyHttpServer.MHttpContext
          Little modification of BasicHttpContext to add access to the underlying tcp socket.
static class TinyHttpServer.MHttpRequestHandlerRegistry
          A slightly modified version of org.apache.http.protocol.HttpRequestHandlerRegistry that allows the registry to be modified while some threads may be using it.

          Common name that will appear in the root certificate.

          You need to add the class ModSSL to the net.majorkernelpanic.http package.
static int ERROR_HTTPS_SERVER_CRASHED
          An error occured with the HTTPS server :(
static java.lang.String KEYSTORE_NAME
          Name of the file used to store the keystore containing the certificates for HTTPS.
static java.lang.String[] MODULES
           
static java.lang.String PREF_HTTP_ENABLED
          Key used in the SharedPreferences to store whether the HTTP server is enabled or not.

 void start()

          Stops the HTTP server and/or the HTTPS server but not the Android service.
